scripts.app-concept::start: npm run build-all-libraries && ng serve app-concept
scripts.app-concept::build: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-concept
scripts.app-concept::build::prod: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-concept --prod
scripts.app-science-department::start: npm run build-all-libraries && ng serve app-science-department
scripts.app-science-department::build: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-science-department
scripts.app-science-department::build::prod: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-science-department --prod
scripts.app-transport-department::start: npm run build-all-libraries && ng serve app-transport-department
scripts.app-transport-department::build: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-transport-department
scripts.app-transport-department::build::prod: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build app-transport-department --prod
scripts.guide-ui::start: npm run build-all-libraries && ng serve guide-ui
scripts.guide-ui::build: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build guide-ui
scripts.guide-ui::build::prod: npm run build-all-libraries && ng build guide-ui --prod
scripts.e2e-all: npm run app-concept::e2e && npm run app-science-department::e2e && npm run app-transport-department::e2e && npm run guide-ui::e2e
